homepage.heroTitle: Find Your Dream Job in Hong Kong
homepage.heroSubtitle: Connect with top employers and discover opportunities that match your skills and ambitions. Join thousands of professionals who trust HK Job Pro.
homepage.ctaTitle: Ready to Find Your Next Opportunity?
homepage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have found their dream jobs through HK Job Pro.

features.title: Why Choose HK Job Pro?
features.subtitle: We're revolutionizing job searching in Hong Kong with modern tools and personalized experiences.

smartMatching.title: Smart Job Matching
smartMatching.description: Our AI-powered system matches you with relevant opportunities based on your skills and preferences.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Get instant notifications when new jobs that match your criteria are posted.

companyInsights.title: Company Insights
companyInsights.description: Access detailed company profiles, culture insights, and employee reviews.

applicationTracking.title: Application Tracking
applicationTracking.description: Keep track of all your applications and their status in one centralized dashboard.

mobileOptimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobileOptimized.description: Job search on the go with our fully responsive mobile-first design.

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy controls.

companies.heroSubtitle: Explore leading employers in Hong Kong and find your perfect workplace. Connect with companies that value your skills and ambitions.
companies.searchPlaceholder: Search companies by name, industry, or location...
companies.ctaTitle: Are You a Company Looking to Hire?
companies.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of companies that trust HK Job Pro to find the best talent.

about.heroTitle: Revolutionizing Job Search in Hong Kong
about.heroSubtitle: We're on a mission to connect talented individuals with amazing opportunities, using modern technology to make job searching and hiring more efficient than ever.
about.missionDescription: To bridge the gap between exceptional talent and outstanding opportunities through innovative technology and deep market understanding.
about.whyStartedTitle: Why We Started HK Job Pro
about.reason1: Traditional job boards were outdated and difficult to navigate, creating friction for both job seekers and employers.
about.reason2: The Hong Kong job market needed a platform that understood local nuances and business culture.
about.reason3: Technology could make job matching more intelligent and efficient for everyone involved.
about.visionDescription: To become Hong Kong's most trusted and efficient job recruitment platform, where every job seeker finds their ideal career path and every employer discovers exceptional talent.
about.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide everything we do and shape the culture of our platform.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge technology to create the most efficient job matching platform.

peopleCentric.title: People-Centric
peopleCentric.description: Every feature is designed with real user needs in mind, ensuring the best experience for all.

qualityAssured.title: Quality Assured
qualityAssured.description: We maintain high standards in everything we do, from job listings to candidate profiles.

hongKongFocused.title: Hong Kong Focused
hongKongFocused.description: Deep understanding of the local job market and business culture in Hong Kong.

about.teamSubtitle: A diverse group of professionals passionate about transforming the job search experience.
about.technologySubtitle: We use cutting-edge technologies to deliver a fast, secure, and reliable platform.
about.performanceDescription: Lightning-fast page loads and real-time updates ensure you never miss an opportunity.
about.securityDescription: Enterprise-grade security protects your personal information and ensures data privacy.
about.aiDescription: Smart algorithms help match the right candidates with the perfect job opportunities.
about.ctaSubtitle: Whether you're looking for your next career opportunity or seeking top talent, we're here to help.
